answerText: The Lion and the Jewel [10] The Lion and the Jewel was written by this Nigerian author of Madmen and Specialists and Death and the King's Horseman.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | Chicago Culture Heroes and Psychopomps | 16 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: One character in this work is teased for running out of adjectives, which he explains is due to his owning only the Shorter Companion Dictionary. FTPE:   [10] Name this play about a love triangle that includes the schoolteacher Lakunle and the two title characters.
